title: New: Alt-J – Buffalo (Feat. Mountain Man)
content: Taking a break from a rather arduous University assignment, and what should greet me other than a brand new song from Mercury Prize winners Alt-J featuring Bella Union’s Mountain Man taken from the official soundtrack of Silver Linings Playbook, a film that premiered at the Toronto film festival earlier in the year. Utilizing the stunning vocals found on their debut LP An Awesome Wave, it’s not much of a departure from the sound that earned them such esteemed plaudits, with the intricate relationship between each instrument directing the majority of Buffalo.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
